summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffery Edwards and Jes Staley discussing financial matters, including a significant deal involving WaMu and the performance of the Private Bank. The conversation touches on personal sentiments and business dealings, indicating a close professional relationship.

persons.name: Jeffery Edwards
persons.context: Jeffery Edwards is communicating with Jes Staley about financial opportunities and personal sentiments.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is receiving updates from Jeffery Edwards regarding financial dealings and personal reflections.

persons.name: Sheldon Adelson
persons.context: Sheldon Adelson is mentioned in the context of being removed from the bank by Jeffery Edwards.

connections.description: Jeffery Edwards and Jes Staley are engaged in a personal and professional correspondence discussing financial matters.

keyFacts: Jeffery Edwards mentions spending time with Treasury and the Private Bank bringing in $44 billion in two weeks.
Jes Staley expresses a sentiment of missing the sender and discusses a deal involving WaMu.
Sheldon Adelson is mentioned as being removed from the bank by Jeffery Edwards.
